## Criterion.URI type

The URI of the specified criterion.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type URI<C extends Chapter = Chapter, V extends Version = Version> = Criteria[C]["versions"] extends Iterable<infer T> ? T extends readonly [V, {
        readonly uri: infer U;
    }] ? U : never : never;
```
